There were no other sightings in New York on or around May 17th 2013
Summary: 4 Orange-Red lights hovering over open field
divs: Sighting Details4 red-orange lights were hovering over an open field.. 3 of the lights were directly in line, while one of the lights in the middle was out of line. As we moved closer to the light to get a better view. the light that was out of line moved over to form a straight line of all 4 lights... then all faded away
